% pdflatex -shell-escape filename.tex
\documentclass[grado3]{LEMA-Tikz-IM}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}
\newcommand{\shiftedGroup}[1]{
  \begin{scope}[shift={#1}]
    \midDotGroup{3}{2}
  \end{scope}
}
\midDotGroup{3}{2}
\midDotGroup[shift={(4.8*\midDotSize,0)}]{3}{2}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
